results.title: Antitumor Activity of Simvastatin in Preclinical Models of Mantle Cell Lymphoma
results.text_hl: The effective impairment of @DISEASE_Lymphoma_Mantle_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D020522 @@@MCL@@@ cell survival was accompanied by the inhibition of @GENE_AKT1 @GENE_207 @@@AKT@@@ and @GENE_MTOR @GENE_419455 @@@mTOR@@@ phosphorylation. Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ strongly decreased @DISEASE_Lymphoma_Mantle_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D020522 @@@MCL@@@ cell migration and invasion ability, leading to a 55% @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ growth inhibition and a consistent diminution of @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Marrow_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001855 @@@bone marrow and spleen metastasis@@@ in vivo.

citations.NLM: Santos JC, Profitós-Pelejà N, Ribeiro ML, Roué G. Antitumor Activity of Simvastatin in Preclinical Models of Mantle Cell Lymphoma Cancers (Basel). 2022 Nov 15;14(22):. PMID: 36428695
